ratings.comment: Very funny an understanding, he helped me out when I had medical issues and wasn't a tough grader. Will take again.

I genuinely enjoyed having Professor Taiwo this semester. He's a fair grader— as long as you follow the rubric, you're in good shape. His Canvas page is super organized and easy to navigate. I really appreciated how responsive he was to emails. He usually got back to me within a couple of hours, and max a day. Overall a nice guy !

The instructor is good. At times, it can be a bit confusing when he explains the assignments. However, the class is quite easy if you stay on top of the assignments and readings. He also offers extra credit!

The class was super easy and pretty straightforward. However the professor had a super disorganized canvas page (syllabus given was from last semester and not all assignments were in the syllabus or timeline for the course). Lots of the work felt like busywork. Professor was super helpful and encouraging, but not easy to reach outside of class.
All grading is based on clear rubrics that are available on Canvas. Gives feedback after every assignment. Answers emails quickly.
The course was well-organized, with a fair mix of two exams and four speeches that really helped improve both my understanding and my public speaking skills.

Overall, I would say he was a very good professor. He can be quiet, but he is very helpful when you ask questions, and he is very caring when it comes to his students. He is gracious with late work and extra credit as well.

Super supportive and kind instructor. Course-load isn't too bad as long as you pay attention to the schedule of things. Overall, I would say one of the best teachers for Com Arts 100. Definetely reccomend.

Overall a pretty okay professor with no problems in the course. The course will be mind numbingly boring, but there's some merit to the content taught. Not very accessible outside class, canvas not well organized, but he's doing pretty well with the content the university requires him to teach. Wouldn't avoid.
Good instructor that cares about the material and his students.
Overall he was a good professor, I would say it was confusing at time what assignments he wanted us to complete, or he would forget to tell us on time but he was respectful and gave extra credit.
Sometimes hard to figure out communication of assignments and how they are turned in but overall good class and would definitely take again!
Very straight forward and easy to follow class structure
Very easy grader. Very nice
Great, passionate professor
Incredibly caring and truly happy to be teaching CA100.
He is a great professor. I learned a lot in his class this semester. he values class participation, attendance, and he likes when his students collaborate. he also is very caring and understanding

Steve is a very kind guy and a great professor, he met you where you're at and wants you to suceed in his class. Overall the course was sutructured nicley and is pretty light, there are only 3 bigger assignments/ projects but they were not difficult at all. Steve made the classes fun and interesting .

The professor is professional and goes over many examples in class. He also makes the time to help improve your speech and leave personalized feedback. Finally, he offers many opportunities for extra credit and makes the class fun, interesting, and educational. would recommend this prof! I actually thought of dropping out but stayed. don't regret.
Overall, a great professor for an easy A but sometimes the directions or guidelines for due dates and expectations are a bit unclear.
good and ineresting

Opeoluwa was by far the best professor I have ever had. He makes class so fun and I thoroughly enjoyed coming to class and was sad when I missed it. Speeches are very low stress, and it was not hard to do at all. He makes sure to make class entertaining and light-hearted while still teaching and ensuring we get an education.

Steve is awesome. He is so funny and makes this required class very fun. He is chill, but still stays on top of you to get your work done. My class got close and we had a good time! He also was good at teaching us from the textbook and you do learn a lot about public speaking.

Steve is a great teacher. He cares about his students, is a very fair grader, and is very funny in class. He is always looking for the best interest in his students and has made everyone in our class comfortable enough to always having an open discussion with one another. I would definitely recommend him as a teacher.
Steve was amazing! Take his class!:)

The professors ability to teach this course started out difficult, but because of how open the class was and how willing he was to listen to the class for improvement, it ended up becoming a pretty cool course. I learned a lot from being in this class.
Professor was very nice but new to teaching.
Can sometimes get off topic but overall very good.
